Title: Divide and Conquer
Writer: Aaron Korsh (created by), Daniel Arkin, Sharyn Rothstein (executive story editor), Sandra Silverstein (executive story editor)
Actors: Gabriel Macht, Patrick J. Adams, Rick Hoffman, Meghan Markle
Plot: Harvey, Louis and Donna must get on the same page - and fast - when Bratton Gould comes after PSL for poaching an attorney. Mike and Rachel struggle to make time for their wedding plans.
